original_title: Doing it Right: Democracy in the Pacific
overview: Covers the Compact of Free Association, hearings at the United Nations and the US Congress, US military interests, nuclear free zones, the IPSECO power plant scandal, and the suicide of Palauan President Lazarus Salii. Seen from the point of view of the Palauans' struggle for a democratic and fair solution to these political difficulties.
title: Doing it Right: Democracy in the Pacific
